ComicInfo.Summary:
The circumstances that led Mary’s mysterious burn patient to her hospital are becoming clearer – but is this horribly hurt man really the Shadow? And what is his connection with the millionaire Worthy Delaney, an advisor to the newly elected President Wyatt? Meanwhile, Mary and her sister Luisa begin an investigation of their own into a Shadow fan-site – because if the information there lets people make the connection with her patient, the Shadow is in grave danger!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Tyler Kirkham & Arif Prianto | 1 | B | Cover B | Michael Kaluta & Peter Pantazis | 2 | C | Cover C | Tommy Lee Edwards | 3 | D/RI | 1:10 Retailer Incentive "Virgin Art" Edition Cover | Michael Kaluta & Peter Pantazis | 4 | E/RI | 1:20 Retailer Incentive "Black & White" Edition Cover | Tommy Lee Edwards | 5 | F/RI | 1:30 Retailer Incentive "Black & White" Edition Cover | Tyler Kirkham | 6 | G/RI | 1:40 Retailer Incentive "Black & White" Edition Cover | Michael Kaluta | 7 |
